translation.description: Your secured and reliable crypto wallet
translation.sub-description1: Trade and reviewing your asset balance have evolved into a simple application.
translation.sub-description2: That’s why there are over 5 million users using WhateverPay.
translation.feature1-description: WhateverPay wallet is a decentralized digital asset wallet based on blockchain technology. Users can use wallet to complete transactions on third-party platforms
translation.feature2-description: With just a phone number and password. Users can withdraw their digital assets to their desired withdrawal address with our user friendly interfaces.
translation.feature3-description: Users can set up Auto Debit to their favorite services, you don’t have to go through multiple transaction procedures every single month. You can cancel the monthly subscription billing at any time.
translation.feature4-description: With our encrypt key provided for each individual, we assured every asset you owned is protected. Users have total control over their asset management.
